title: Doge Miner 2
description: Doge Mineris back in this fantastic sequel â€“ Doge Miner 2! The mission remains the same: to purchase a spaceship and blast off to the moon, but you now have an increase amount of tools, upgrades and options at your disposal. Doge Miner 2 builds upon the fun mechanisms and gameplay of the original title and adds extras features for your enjoyment.
